main event: A civilian observer reported seeing an unidentified object in the sky above Clovis, New Mexico on September 2, 1964, at 0440.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3-4 minutes and appeared to be larger than normal aircraft lights,The object emitted small sparks of light and had a slight amber color at the bottom,The observer first noticed it while looking at low cloud cover,The object's flight path was initially stationary but then appeared to gain altitude while dimming,The report concluded that the object was unidentified with no physical evidence.
witness description: Civilian observer, age 21, barber from Clovis, New Mexico.
